passives.name: Inflame
passives.effects: Dealing [[ability damage]] burns enemies, causing them to take {{as|{{ap|15/6}} magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds over 3 seconds, for a total of {{as|15|magic damage}}. Against monsters, the burn deals {{as|{{fd|7.5}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} per tick, dealing a total of {{as|{{ap|(15/6)+7.5}} magic damage}} per tick for up to {{as|{{ap|15+(7.5*6)}}|magic damage}}.
